committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to renegotiate the schedules of payment, and to waive certain interest requirements, on certain loans to the Redwood Valley County Water District.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to renegotiate the schedules of payment for certain loans to the Redwood Valley County Water District, California. Suspends the obligation to repay such loans and interest charges until such renegotiated schedules take effect.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to renegotiate the schedules of payment, and to waive certain interest requirements, on certain loans to the Redwood Valley County Water District.
